Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Just a simple idea that popped into my head, but it would be lovely to see some kerbals wandering around the KSC complex, either on foot, or using those little golf-buggy contraptions that are popular on large campuses - or doing pretty much any of the things that they're doing in the SPH and VAB backdrops

Would make rover testing a lot more fun if I had to dodge the personnel!

Cheers!
More interactable objects controlled by AI? I am not sure it is in the scope. Though if we are talking about overall KSC view, I guess some animations to make it looks a bit livelier wouldn't hurt.

*Insert Whining/Lazy Kerbal Voice*

Isn't walking around the VAB/SPH enough work? C'mooooonnnnnnn I don't wanna go outside!

On a serious note, this would be a neat little feature

+1

We already have 'safe' animations inside the vehicle assembly buildings. Maybe step 1 can be to have that type of thing outside. Although, I guess in the VAB's there's no gravity and laws of physics (Have yo seen what happens when you do a x8 symetry on a rocket and attached the 8 to a capsule!?!!? :-D) while in the KSP view, I guess all rules are set. E.g. it will not be colision free by default. See what happens when an AI kelbal walks into the corner of the admin building and destroys the whole thing.

We miss the suggestion to add working doors to the buildings ;-)

I can't help to want SIMS (do we call it KIMS?) in the whole game.

See what happens when an AI kelbal walks into the corner of the admin building and destroys the whole thing.

Two words- AI nodes
Sounds like we have similar interests.

Yeah, I am already following a thread like this, but with EVA.

Kerbals Being More Petloke
